title: This Game Is Too Realistic - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Sci-fi   Slice of Life
tags: Adventurers   Alternate World   Apocalypse   Arms Dealers   Army   Army Building   Artificial Intelligence   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Cannibalism   Clones   Cooking   Cunning Protagonist   Different Social Status   Discrimination   Economics   Fanaticism   Fanfiction   Farming   Game Elements   Gamers   Generals   Genetic Modifications   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hunters   Industrialization   Inheritance   Kingdom Building   Leadership   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Management   Mercenaries   Merchants   Military   Misunderstandings   Money Grubber   Monster Tamer   Monsters   Multiple POV   Multiple Realms   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Nobles   Parallel Worlds   Parasites   Post-apocalyptic   Religions   Schemes And Conspiracies   Scientists   Secrets   S*aves   Soldiers   Survival   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Wars   Weak to Strong

description:
Chu Guang, who had traveled to the post-apocalyptic world, discovered that he had unlocked a shelter system and was able to summon creatures named 'player' from the previous world.

From that day on, the whole post-apocalyptic world became like a game.>
